          <title>
            <string language="en">Storage of liquid nitrogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Speicherung des flüssigen Stickstoffes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mémoire de l'azote liquide</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows a wide-necked double walled glass Thermos flask that is used to store liquid nitrogen.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

            <string language="en">double walled glass flask</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt eine breit-wide-necked 
doppelte walled Glasthermos Flasche, die benutzt wird, um flüssigen 
Stickstoff zu speichern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure montre un double flacon en verre muré 
large-étranglé de Thermos qui est utilisé pour enregistrer 
l'azote liquide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra um flask de vidro walled dobro 
largo-wide-necked de Thermos que seja usado armazenar o nitrogênio 
líquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura mostra una doppia boccetta di vetro 
walled largo-con il collo di Thermos che è utilizzata per memorizzare
l'azoto liquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός εμφανίζει ευρύς-νεθκεδ διπλή περιτοιχισμένη
φιάλη Thermos γυαλιού που χρησιμοποιείται για να καταχωρήσει το
υγρό άζωτο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra un frasco de cristal emparedado
doble ancho-wide-necked de Thermos que se utilice para salvar el 
nitrógeno líquido.</string>
